INSERT INTO resumen_cobranzas_ia_tabla (
  id_oddo,
  total_llamadas,
  llamadas_efectivas_ultimos_5_dias,
  llamadas_efectivas_total,
  llamadas_no_efectivas,
  contestadora,
  sin_contestar_agent,
  llamada_colgada_user,
  llamada_colgada_agent,
  llamada_fallida,
  llamada_inactiva,
  pct_voicemail,
  pct_no_answer,
  pct_hangup,
  intentos_realizados,
  estado,
  ultima_act,
  contador_estado,
  pct_fails,
  pct_inactive
) 
SELECT
  call_details.id_oddo,
  COUNT(*) AS total_llamadas,
  SUM(
    CASE
      WHEN call_details.duration_minutes > 2 :: DOUBLE PRECISION 
      AND call_details.start_timestamp >= (now() - '5 days' :: INTERVAL) THEN 1 ELSE 0 
    END
  ) AS llamadas_efectivas_ultimos_5_dias,
  SUM(CASE WHEN call_details.duration_minutes > 2 :: DOUBLE PRECISION THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS llamadas_efectivas_total,
  SUM(CASE WHEN call_details.duration_minutes <= 2 :: DOUBLE PRECISION THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS llamadas_no_efectivas,
  SUM(CASE WHEN call_details.disconnection_reason :: TEXT = 'voicemail_reached' :: TEXT THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS contestadora,
  SUM(CASE WHEN call_details.disconnection_reason :: TEXT = 'dial_no_answer' :: TEXT THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS sin_contestar_agent,
  SUM(CASE WHEN call_details.disconnection_reason :: TEXT = 'user_hangup' :: TEXT THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS llamada_colgada_user,
  SUM(CASE WHEN call_details.disconnection_reason :: TEXT = 'agent_hangup' :: TEXT THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS llamada_colgada_agent,
  SUM(CASE WHEN call_details.disconnection_reason :: TEXT = 'dial_failed' :: TEXT THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS llamada_fallida,
  SUM(CASE WHEN call_details.disconnection_reason :: TEXT = 'inactivity' :: TEXT THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS llamada_inactiva,
  SUM(CASE WHEN call_details.disconnection_reason :: TEXT = 'voicemail_reached' :: TEXT THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) :: NUMERIC * 100.0 / COUNT(*) :: NUMERIC AS pct_voicemail,
  SUM(CASE WHEN call_details.disconnection_reason :: TEXT = 'dial_no_answer' :: TEXT THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) :: NUMERIC * 100.0 / COUNT(*) :: NUMERIC AS pct_no_answer,
  SUM(CASE WHEN call_details.disconnection_reason :: TEXT = 'user_hangup' :: TEXT THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) :: NUMERIC * 100.0 / COUNT(*) :: NUMERIC AS pct_hangup,

  COUNT(DISTINCT call_details.ID) AS intentos_realizados,

  -- Estado: "excluido" si los criterios se cumplen, de lo contrario NULL o mantener el valor actual
  CASE 
    WHEN (SUM(CASE WHEN call_details.disconnection_reason IN ('voicemail_reached', 'dial_no_answer', 'user_hangup','dial_failed','inactivity') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) :: NUMERIC * 100.0 / COUNT(*) :: NUMERIC) > 30.0
    AND COUNT(DISTINCT call_details.ID) > 15 
    THEN 'excluido' 
    ELSE NULL 
  END AS estado,

  -- Última actualización (timestamp actual)
  NOW() AS ultima_act,

  -- Contador de cambios en estado (incrementa si el estado cambia)
  0 AS contador_estado,
    SUM(CASE WHEN call_details.disconnection_reason :: TEXT = 'dial_failed' :: TEXT THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) :: NUMERIC * 100.0 / COUNT(*) :: NUMERIC AS pct_fails,
        SUM(CASE WHEN call_details.disconnection_reason :: TEXT = 'inactivity' :: TEXT THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) :: NUMERIC * 100.0 / COUNT(*) :: NUMERIC AS pct_inactive  
FROM call_details
WHERE call_details.campaign_name ILIKE '%Cobranz%'
GROUP BY call_details.id_oddo
ON CONFLICT (id_oddo) 
DO UPDATE SET 
  total_llamadas = EXCLUDED.total_llamadas,
  llamadas_efectivas_ultimos_5_dias = EXCLUDED.llamadas_efectivas_ultimos_5_dias,
  llamadas_efectivas_total = EXCLUDED.llamadas_efectivas_total,
  llamadas_no_efectivas = EXCLUDED.llamadas_no_efectivas,
  contestadora = EXCLUDED.contestadora,
  sin_contestar_agent = EXCLUDED.sin_contestar_agent,
  llamada_colgada_user = EXCLUDED.llamada_colgada_user,
  llamada_colgada_agent = EXCLUDED.llamada_colgada_agent,
  llamada_fallida = EXCLUDED.llamada_fallida,
  llamada_inactiva = EXCLUDED.llamada_inactiva,
  pct_voicemail = EXCLUDED.pct_voicemail,
  pct_inactive = EXCLUDED.pct_inactive,
  pct_fails = EXCLUDED.pct_fails,
  pct_no_answer = EXCLUDED.pct_no_answer,
  pct_hangup = EXCLUDED.pct_hangup,
  intentos_realizados = EXCLUDED.intentos_realizados,
  
  -- Actualiza la última actualización
  ultima_act = NOW(),
  
  -- Actualiza el estado si se cumplen los criterios
  estado = CASE 
    WHEN (EXCLUDED.pct_voicemail + EXCLUDED.pct_no_answer + EXCLUDED.pct_hangup + EXCLUDED.pct_fails + EXCLUDED.pct_inactive) > 30.0
    AND EXCLUDED.intentos_realizados > 21 
    THEN 'excluido' 
    ELSE resumen_cobranzas_ia_tabla.estado
  END;

-- Ahora actualizamos la tabla de contador_estado
INSERT INTO contador_estado_cobranzas (id_oddo, contador_estado)
SELECT id_oddo, 1
FROM resumen_cobranzas_ia_tabla
WHERE estado = 'excluido'
ON CONFLICT (id_oddo)
DO UPDATE SET 
  contador_estado = contador_estado_cobranzas.contador_estado + 1;
